title: What song makes you instantly feel better when you are lonely? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kashmir gives me a feeling of connecting with something bigger, something metaphysical, something worth more than any troubles the world might present. The radio overplayed it though, sadly.  Poorboy Shuffle is another great song. So, is Effigy. From the same album I’d take either of those or this one, “Side Of the Road” to cheer me up or relieve any sombre mood. It’s Creedence Clearwater Revival.  This one’s hard not to stave away any negative thoughts It’s the Talking Heads -Naive Melody or “This Must Be the Place”.  Someone once said to me “U2 broke my heart”. They broke mine too. Before they did, though, they put this song on The Unforgettable Fire LP -It’s called Elvis Presley and America. It was a go to sometimes. As was the entire album and Boy and War.  Lots of these but just one more here on this answer for getting me out of a funk this works every time. It’s old and it’s skin is cold…but if it works, don’t fix it. Shaman’s Blues by The Doors.
